docs.lead_paragraph: Yunnan Without Tour Guides What's the best way to arrange off-the-beaten path travel in a country where you don't speak the language? I'm hoping to travel to Yunnan Province in China next spring but don't want to go with a tour and don't want to completely wing it either. -- Karla Robertson, San Francisco

docs.lead_paragraph: The requirement that everyone buy health insurance moved a step closer to reality last week -- and possibly a step closer to being challenged in court. Conservatives and libertarians, mostly, have been advancing the theory lately that the individual mandate, in which the government would compel everyone to buy insurance or pay a penalty, is unconstitutional.

headline.kicker: PRESCRIPTIONS MAKING SENSE OF THE HEALTH CARE DEBATE

docs.abstract: Conservatives and libertarians have recently been advancing idea that proposed individual mandate that would require everyone to have insurance coverage is unconstitutional; lawyer David Rivkin suggests mandate would violate commerce clause because Congress cannot regulate activity that is not economic; Wake Forest University Prof Mark A Hall believes mandate clearly falls under definition of economic activity; photo (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: The requirement that everyone buy health insurance moved a step closer to reality last week - and possibly a step closer to being challenged in court.

headline.main: A Constitutional Debate Over a Health Care Mandate

docs.abstract: A proposed federal mandate for every individual to have health insurance has stirred a legal debate over whether Congress has the constitutional authority to impose such a requirement.
docs.snippet: A proposed federal mandate for every individual to have health insurance has stirred a legal debate over whether Congress has the constitutional authority to impose such a requirement.

docs.lead_paragraph: World leaders head back home this morning after an unusually dramatic Group of 20 summit that included sharp warnings to Iran after the disclosure that the nation is building a secret underground plant to manufacture nuclear fuel.
docs.abstract: World leaders headed home Saturday after a dramatic Group of 20 summit that included warnings to Iran after a disclosure that it is building an underground nuclear fuel plant.
